pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7、8、10
  • Processor: 2.0GHz
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7、8、10
  • Processor: 2.0GHz
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
